item.title: 9-Days Tour Package
item.description: Day 1-2: Sigiriya and Dambulla Travel to the ancient city of Sigiriya, home to the famous Sigiriya Rock Fortress, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Also, explore the stunning Dambulla Cave Temples and the vibrant local markets. Day 3: Kandy Travel to the cultural city of Kandy, home to the famous Temple of the Tooth Relic, which is a UNESCO World Heritage Site. Also, explore the stunning Royal Botanic Gardens, the scenic Kandy Lake, and the vibrant local markets.
